content.name: Addition
content.description: Applies the addition operation to <op1> and <op2> and returns the result. If you did not know this you should reconsider your life.

content.name: Subtraction
content.description: Subtracts <op2> from <op1> and returns the result.

content.name: Multiplication
content.description: Multiplies the two operands and returns the result.

content.name: Division
content.description: Divides the first operand by the second and returns the result.

content.name: Modulo
content.description: Divides the first operand by the second and returns the rest.

content.name: Print
content.description: Prints all supplied objects to the Minimatica console.

content.name: Lambda Expressions
content.description: ... is an exemplary lambda expression. The identifier within square brackets (here: <x>) is an inline parameter definition. It can be used with coefficients and exponents.

content.name: Function applications
content.description: ... is an example application of <x> to the function denoted by <func>.

content.name: Integrate
content.description: Returns the indefinite integral of the function <op>.

content.name: Derive
content.description: Returns the derivation of the function <op>.

content.name: Matrix
content.description: Constructs a matrix with the specified number of rows and columns and initializes it with the supplied objects. The number of objects must be exactly <rows> * <cols>.

content.name: Vector
content.description: Constructs a matrix with one column and <dimensions> rows. It is initialized and handled like a regular matrix.

content.name: Factorial
content.description: Returns the factorial of <op> (i. e. op!).
